channel.title: Wilderness issue
channel.description: Right now my wilderness skull is overriding my safezone. So if im in a safezone and wild coords are overlapping it still shows wild level. You also still cant attack players. What code would i use so that it doesnt show wild level in safezone. something like this [code=java]if(c.safezone() blah blah return;[/code]

item.title: Wilderness issue

item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Look at where the wild level is drawn, and add a condition to check if theyâ€™re not in a safe zone.

if (inWild() && !inSafeZone()) ...
